item.title: How I get website aproved?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

PM an admin. And it needs to be online.

Btw, its “Portfolio,” “Network,” and “Forums.” And if you want an honest suggestion, don’t start forums. My guess is that no one will join, and until you have a couple hundred/thousand site hits a day, you should bother setting up forums. It’s just not worth the time and energy.

The background seems rather distracting, so maybe change that to a simpler background. You can try to diffuse it more or darken it so it’s not as eye-catching. I guess I should wait to see the whole thing before I judge it.

Also, I guess you are using tables. Don’t. Learn divs; it will be the best thing you’ve ever done in your life.

Take it easy on the graphics, keep the website load under a second. When you upload it, use this: http://tools.pingdom.com/fpt/ to see what is slowing you down, and where to optimize.

Read full topic
